name: filerise
description: FileRise is an online self-hosted document viewer and converter supporting office documents, PDFs, and images with export capabilities. Built for quick previewing and sharing across teams without relying on third-party services.
features: Document Viewer: Preview office documents and PDFs, Image viewing, Export capabilities. Quick document access without downloads.
Format Support: Multiple document types. Universal compatibility.
Team Sharing: Share previews across teams. Collaborative viewing.
Self-Hosted: No third-party services. Complete privacy.
Conversion: Export to different formats. Flexible output.
Web-Based: No software installation. Browser access.
Fast Rendering: Quick document loading. Efficient viewing.
Annotations: Add comments and notes. Collaborative review.
Version Control: Track document changes. History management.
